column5: Starry’s Studio is positioned a quick two blocks off Fredericksburg’s central Main Street, half a block from a bicycle rental shop and mere steps from all the shopping, dining, entertainment and arts that make Fredericksburg, Texas the consummate Hill Country destination.   As a 900 sq ft apartment-style suite, Starry’s Studio offers many standard hotel amenities plus posh, additional perks.  My place is good for couples, close friends, and solo adventurers.  For more info, try looking us up
column8: Starry's Studio- chic suite in the heart of FBG
